name: HappyThoughts
0:
”Alexa, ask Maddie's heart for a happy thought.”
”Ask Maddie's heart to cheer me up.”
”Ask Maddie's heart to tell me a happy thought.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: maddie's heart
des: Engage in this skill by asking Alexa to ask Maddie's heart to cheer you up or for a happy thought.
